message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product's value.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  However, the product's value is significantly higher than that to me. I could consider letting it go for $18,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $16,000. I'm willing to make a compromise, but that's my top price.
